title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Skills: Music Education Repertoire Selection Strategies Using Backward Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental music theory and educational planning experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can clearly define music education objectives according to the backward design model.
Learners can establish repertoire selection criteria considering educational philosophy, learner proficiency levels, practicality, etc.
Learners can effectively evaluate and propose implementation strategies for repertoires in mobile environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
